name: Squirm
description: After a previous adventure, you and your rat friend stop for a snooze. When you wake up, the rat is gone and strange creatures have appeared across the land as if from out of nowhere! What has happened while you were asleep? Where is your rat friend?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: On-board sound Additional Notes: As long as your computer isn't a potato you should be able to run this.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: On-board sound Additional Notes: As long as your computer isn't a potato you should be able to run this.
